general.headline: SoFi Technologies Stock Is Sliding Wednesday: What's Going On? - SoFi Technologies  ( NASDAQ:SOFI )

general.headline: Semiconductor Slump Puts Direxion's NVDA-Centered NVDU And NVDD ETFs In Focus - NVIDIA  ( NASDAQ:NVDA ) , Direxion Daily NVDA Bear 1X Shares  ( NASDAQ:NVDD )

general.headline: Why Is Hershey's Stock Gaining On Wednesday? - Hershey  ( NYSE:HSY )
general.summary: Hershey's Q2 sales rose 26% YoY, driven by strong confectionery demand. Adjusted EPS outlook cut to a 36-38% decline despite sales gains. Get special access to three exclusive "Top 10 Stocks" power lists today, updated daily.
